ai.title: AI Settings
ai.description: Configure AI-powered features like automatic transaction categorization

tabs.invalidKeysTooltip: One or more API keys are invalid

points.defaultKey: By default, AI features use our server's API key at no extra cost to you.
points.ownKey: If you add your own API key for a provider, that key will be used instead for models from that provider.
points.encrypted: Your API keys are encrypted and stored securely.
points.removal: You can remove your key anytime to switch back to the server-provided key (rate limits will be applied based on current demand).

apiKeyManager.title: API Keys
apiKeyManager.description: Add your own API keys to use specific providers
apiKeyManager.invalidKeyHelp: Add a new key below to replace this one, or remove it if you no longer need it.

deleteDialog.title: Remove API key?
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to remove the {provider} API key?
deleteDialog.descriptionMultiple: AI features currently using {provider} will switch to another available provider.

notifications.saveSuccess: API key saved and validated successfully
notifications.saveFailed: API key is not working. Please verify the key is correct, has sufficient credits, and has the required permissions.

features.title: AI Features
features.description: Configure which model to use for each AI-powered feature

modelHint.text: For transaction categorization, low-cost models like Gemini Flash, Claude Haiku, or GPT-4o Mini are recommended. Categorization is a straightforward task that doesn't require expensive reasoning models. Using cheaper models lets you process more transactions at lower cost.

points.autoSync: When you sync transactions from your bank, uncategorized transactions are automatically sent to AI for categorization.
points.analysis: The AI analyzes transaction descriptions and merchant names to suggest appropriate categories from your existing category list.
points.override: You can always manually override AI-suggested categories.

modelHint.text: For statement parsing, mid-tier models like Claude Sonnet, Gemini Pro, or GPT-4o are recommended. Statement parsing requires understanding complex document structures and extracting accurate data, which benefits from more capable models. However, cheaper models like Gemini Flash or Claude Haiku can also work well for simpler statements.

points.upload: Upload a bank statement (PDF, CSV, or TXT) and AI will extract all transactions automatically.
points.analysis: The AI analyzes the document structure to identify dates, descriptions, amounts, and transaction types.
points.review: You can review and correct any extracted data before importing into your account.
points.cost: Cost is estimated before processing, yet it only reflects the approximate cost.

badges.yourKeyTooltip: This feature uses your personal API key. You have full control over usage and costs, with no rate limits from our server.
badges.serverTooltip: This feature uses our server's shared API key. It's free but may have rate limits during high demand. Add your own API key for unlimited access.

modelSelector.rateLimitWarning: Using server-provided AI with free-tier rate limiting. Feature availability depends on demand from other users. For reliable access, add your own API key in the API Keys tab.
modelSelector.addKeyHint: Add your own API key to select from all available models.
